title: Tolix Stool 31 CM
body: Discover what metals can do with Xavier Pauchard’s Tolix Chair. Designed in 1934 to grace the decks of the S.S. Normandie ocean liner. This chair features a stackable design for convenient rearranging and storage. Suitable for commercial use, having passed load-testing requirements and been approved for heavy domestic, general office, and hospitality use. Use it in your dining table or living space for a casual-chic look.
